awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Representations of Reductive         Algebraic Groups and Related Groups
awd_abstract_narration: The principal investigator will work on the representation                 theory of reductive algebraic groups and related finite and                     infinitesimal groups. The particular topics to be investigated                  are: constructions for the reduction mod p of irreducible                       complex representations of the finite groups; determination of                  the Loewy series of principal indecomposable modules for finite                 groups of Lie type; support varieties of Weyl modules and                       simple modules; the adjoint representation on the regular                       functions on nilpotent orbits and their closures.                                    A group is an algebraic structure with a multiplication                    defined on it. Finite groups may be viewed as algebraic sets of                 transformations of vector spaces. Their properties and                          structure can be determined through these representations.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
